```{r}

names(ICP)
str(ICP)

row.names(ICP)=ICP$num
ICP$num=NULL
names(ICP) = c("Pais","CPI2016")
ICP[duplicated(ICP$Pais),]
ICP[!complete.cases(ICP),]
ICP= ICP[-27,]
ICP= ICP[-65,]
ICP= ICP[-113,]
ICP= ICP[-174,]
```
